FERN ICONS COLLECTION

SEARCH-TIPS

Search Tips

When search input in focus:

* Type characters: Starts the search

* Search: Minimum 2 characters to start the search

* Search: Enter alpha numeric keys

* Escape Key: Clears the search input

* Ctrl+G Keys: Search Input in focus
